title: Can't Leave Inactive Ranked Team
body: I have searched for half an hour now and can't find a way to leave a ranked team without "Error This action can only be performed by a team member."come up. I have reset the client, ran the client as admin, restarted my PC etc etc etc. I have logged onto my smurf to see if my profile says I am still in the team -- which it does -- Anyone got an idea?

replies.body: It is possible that the team has since been deleted, but your account has been attached to a ghost version of it. If this is preventing you from doing something like say joining another team, I suggest you make a support ticket out of this.
